price: Sε εnyε sε anhwε a nnipa nyinaa abεyε nnipa korͻ (anaasε wͻn nyinaa adwen bεtwe akosi wiase afεεfεdeε so) a, anka Yεbεma wͻn a wͻyi Ahummͻborͻ Hene no boniayε no afie nkurusoͻ ayε dwetε, na n’atwedeε a yεde forͻ no nso (ayε dwetε saa ara),
arabic: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن يَكُونَ ٱلنَّاسُ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ لَّجَعَلۡنَا لِمَن يَكۡفُرُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ لِبُيُوتِهِمۡ سُقُفٗا مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَمَعَارِجَ عَلَيۡهَا يَظۡهَرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walawlā an yakūna al-nāsu ummatan wāḥidatan lajaʿalnā liman yakfuru bil-raḥmāni libuyūtihim suqufan min fiḍḍatin wamaʿārija ʿalayhā yaẓharūna
